title: Open classroom
brief_description: This film explores some of the issues involved in the organisation of the open classroom, and focuses on ordinary non-purpose built schools in both Britain and USA. It emphasises the need for an underlying structure and a high level of involvement and co-ordination by teachers and other personnel. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
